fig.label: Fig. 1

caption.p: Rhinovirus (RV). The rhinovirus capsid is arranged in an icosahedron composed of 60 copies of each of the three subunits VP1-3 (shown in red, blue, and yellow).

fig.attrib: Reproduced with permission from Papadopoulos NG and Skevaki CL (2006) Viruses of the lung. In: Encyclopedia of Respiratory Medicine, 483â€“488, https://doi.org/10.1016/B0-12-370879-6/00494-4.
